edu.iu.dsc.tws.tset.env

Class StreamingEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.tset.env.TSetEnvironment
      • edu.iu.dsc.tws.tset.env.StreamingEnvironment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StreamTSetCDFWEnvironment

    public class StreamingEnvironment
extends TSetEnvironment
    Implementation of TSetEnvironment for streaming OperationMode.

    There is only a single execution mode that would run the entire TSet graph.
